============================================

Reason why (sketch):
  Using addition identities, one pair (F_k, F_{k+1}) yields both F_{2k} and F_{2k+1}:
    F_{2k}   = F_k (2F_{k+1} − F_k)
    F_{2k+1} = F_k^2 + F_{k+1}^2
  Recursing on n’s binary expansion gives O(log n) exact computation.
